ModMetaData.name: More Vision Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 5 new genes related to the Nearsighted gene, 3 Farsighted genes and 2 Nearsighted genes.
Very Farsighted: 10% Short range accuracy, 25% Medium range accuracy Farsighted: 25% Short range accuracy, 50% Medium range accuracy Slightly Farsighted: 50% Short range accuracy, 75% Medium range accuracy Slightly Nearsighted: 50% Long range accuracy, 75% Medium range accuracy Very Nearsighted: 10% Long range accuracy, 25% Medium range accuracy
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url]
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreVisionGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
